entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 17.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
